name: ekonzims
description: EkoNzims - Platform for e-commerce and cleaning services

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:web & npm run dev:mobile
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
